===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
Originally {{zh-l|*厶}}, a deformed version of {{zh-l|已}}. {{lang|zh|以}} is a further deformation of {{lang|zh|厶}} with the addition of {{zh-l|*人|person}} on the right side.
